title: itty bitty 8-bit (birthday remix)
desc:
if you haven't noticed already i do music too, but not as often. anyways this is my gift to all of you, because i would feel bad about getting gifts and not giving one back ok... hope u enjoy this new type of content and tell me if i should do more...

yes that is a bfdi reference on betpowo.github.io. yes it's real
